comment: I strongly advise against recommending her. My experience with her was extremely negative. Be prepared that all of her quizzes will be open late, as homework assignments are due on Aleks. She is highly disorganized and unfamiliar with D2L. She is a friendly and very nice person, but it won't help you.

Professor HS is super sweet. Everyone saying she is disorganized does not account for all she has been going through. She really does want students to succeed and will pass you with an A in lab or lecture f you just work hard and go to office hours. Chem 1 and 2 are hard and having a down to earth professor makes it a lot more comfortable!

DO NOT TAKE HER. She was so forgetful&disorganized. The class constantly had to remind her to open up our homework and to upload the slides she uses in class. We were constantly 2 weeks behind all the other CHEM 1211 classes. She never answered questions correctly in class and she would always lose her lecture slides somehow...
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: All I did was go to class and listened and followed her lecture while taking notes and I would score 90s and 80s on the exams. I also turned in my hw on time. She offers helpful extra credit and allows the opportunity to replace all your exam scores with the final if you made higher in that section. Class not that hard. These ratings OD.

I really enjoyed Professor Henderson's class. These ratings seem harsh, likely from students who skipped class or ignored resources. She's a bit disorganized, but will ensure your success. Offers EC + final exam policy that replaces all unit test grades. Attend class, study her notes, go to office hours, and you'll do fine. I went from an F to a B.

DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR, YOU WILL SUFFER! (we never saw our grade until the end of the semester....) Nice professor, but nice won't help you pass. Overall, she just CAN NOT TEACH! BEWARE IM TELLING YOU NOW

The most disorganized teacher I have ever met. I purely relied on the textbook for the class and taught myself the information. She is a nice person but not a great teacher and 100% unprepared. I have never been so frustrated with a teacher. Please take a different professor. The standardized final saved my grade.

Assignments would not be open according to the syllabus. She talks low and had trouble with slides. Lectures lacked helpful examples and were barely visible. Students doing well relied solely on outside resources from other professors/textbook. She is a nice person but do not take her. There are better prepared professors.

Do not take this professor! She is new to KSU and doesn't know how to use D2L. Super disorganized. Kept moving around due dates for homework and quizzes. Never before have I disliked a professor's way of teaching until now. The professor is nice she just shouldn't be teaching. Couldn't even teach the last 3 chapters because ran out of time.
